title: Armored Cars w/ Peter Blaber
description:
Peter Blaber is the CEO of Add Armor, a company that can add defense systems to just about any car. Whether it's bulletproof glass and doors, to pepper spray and sound canons, we got into what makes material so strong, when you would need it, and which cars are the most difficult to modify. 


https://addarmor.com/

T: @thesmokingtire, @zackklapman
IG: @thesmokingtire, @fakezackklapman 

Watch the show! https://youtu.be/Tsup5whzGt4
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
